Get the base API response for a data set's meta data

get_meta_response.Rd

Get the metadata information for a data set available from the EES API.

Usage

get_meta_response(
  dataset_id,
  dataset_version = NULL,
  api_version = NULL,
  parse = TRUE
)

Arguments

dataset_id

ID of data set to be connected to

dataset_version

Version of data set to be connected to

api_version

EES API version

parse

Parse result into structured list

Value

Results of query to API meta data endpoint

Examples

get_meta_response(example_id())
#> $filters
#>      id              column             label                              hint
#> 1 VTQ5X           ethnicity         Ethnicity         Filter by pupil ethnicity
#> 2 Pmjeb            language    First language          Filter by first language
#> 3 1Nei3                 fsm Free School Meals Filter by free school meal status
#> 4 deq0Z phase_type_grouping       School type             Filter by school type
